user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on our current project status. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Update on Our Project Status

Hi John,

When you have a moment, could you please send me a brief update on where we stand with the investment-strategy presentation? Feel free to pull any relevant information from your Gmail threads or the notes in our Notion workspace.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,  
Sarah
